thread.title: New Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 Trailer Was Most Popular Super Bowl Ad
thread.title_full: New Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 Trailer Was Most Popular Super Bowl Ad

author: Jay Jayson
title: New Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 Trailer Was Most Popular Super Bowl Ad
text:
New Guardians Of The Galaxy Vol. 2 Trailer Was Most Popular Super Bowl Ad Jay Jayson   
On Sunday, the New England Patriots scored four touchdowns in their thrilling 34-28 overtime victory over the Atlanta Falcons, but it was Marvel that scored perhaps the biggest touchdown of Super Bowl LI. 
According to the experts keeping score, the Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Super Bowl television spot was the most popular ad of the day. 
It topped comScore 's "Most Talked About Movies " chart by generating 47,800 new conversations yesterday, which was 22,600 more than second-place finisher Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales . Directly below, you can check out their full-chart. 
And when Fandango surveyed more than 1,000 moviegoers after the game, asking them which trailers made them more excited to see the films, it was the Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 that took the crown. 
“Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 scored major points with fans during this year's Super Bowl by delivering a fun, action-packed teaser with plenty of rock 'n roll vibes and just enough Baby Groot to leave us all thirsting for more,” says Fandango Managing Editor Erik Davis. “Proving it's very much a movie for everyone, its Big Game spot clearly showed why it's one of this year's most anticipated films.” 
Here's Fandango's full-list: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2 Logan Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales The Fate of the Furious Transformers: The Last Knight
